title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 159.1 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 159.1 - Applicability

State Regulations

The provisions of this Part shall apply to all growers of
hemp in the State, regardless of whether such hemp is sold or distributed in
the State. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
159.1

Adopted

New

York State Register January 13, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 02, eff. 1/13/2016

Adopted

New

York State Register April 6, 2022/Volume XLIV, Issue 14, eff. 4/6/2022

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
